title: 2022 McDonald's All-American Boys Game
text:
The 2022 <a href="McDonald%27s">McDonald's</a> All-American Boys Game is an <a href="All-star%20game">all-star</a> <a href="basketball">basketball</a> game that is scheduled be held on March 29, 2022. The game's rosters featured the best and most highly recruited high school boys graduating in the class of 2022. The game will be the 45th annual version of the <a href="McDonald%27s%20All-American%20Game">McDonald's All-American Game</a> first played in 1977. Due to the impact of the <a href="COVID-19%20pandemic">COVID-19 pandemic</a>, the game has not been held since <a href="2019%20McDonald%27s%20All-American%20Boys%20Game">2019</a>.
The 24 players were selected from over 700 nominees by a committee of basketball experts. They were chosen not only for their on-court skills, but for their performances off the court as well.
Rosters.
The roster was announced on January 25, 2022. <a href="Duke%20Blue%20Devils%20men%27s%20basketball">Duke</a> and <a href="Kansas%20Jayhawks%20men%27s%20basketball">Kansas</a> had the most selections with three each, while <a href="Alabama%20Crimson%20Tide%20men%27s%20basketball">Alabama</a>, <a href="Arkansas%20Razorbacks%20men%27s%20basketball">Arkansas</a>, <a href="Kentucky%20Wildcats%20men%27s%20basketball">Kentucky</a>, <a href="Texas%20Longhorns%20men%27s%20basketball">Texas</a>, and <a href="UCLA%20Bruins%20men%27s%20basketball">UCLA</a> had two each. At the announcement of roster selections, only 14 schools were represented and one player was uncommitted.
